DESCRI

description: Proposed Piling and Structural repairs to East (Flower) Chapel of Mortuary Chapels
decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The works to which this consent relates shall be carried out in accordance with the Schedule of Works reference AC / IDI/ 18438~Schedule 1. Any departure from this Schedule of Works shall be agreed in writing by the local planning authority prior to the relevant works being carried out.Reason: In order to safeguard the significance of the listed building, in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

With the exception of the floor slab and finish, any repairs or replacements to the existing building fabric shall be carried out on a like-for-like basis, in accordance with the survey of existing building fabric set out under Sections 2.5.1. and 2.5.2. of the Heritage Statement dated 16 March 2021.Reason: In order to safeguard the significance of the listed building, in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to the commencement of the relevant works, specifications and samples of the proposed floor finish shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The works shall then be carried out in accordance with the approved specifications and samples.Reason: In order to safeguard the significance of the listed building, in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
